https://tmrev.io/movie/312330-Brazen Abbot: A Decade of Brazen Abbot Live 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/312330-Brazen Abbot: A Decade of Brazen Abbot Live 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This jam-packed retrospective includes highlights from 10 years of concert footage featuring Finnish rockers Brazen Abbot performing in Europe, as well as backstage footage and interviews with the band's rotating lineup of singers. Tracks include "Mr. Earthman," "One Life to Live," "Slip Away," "Guilty as Sin," "Supernatural," "Can't Let You Go," "I'll Be Free," "I Surrender," "The Road to Hell" and more. Brazen Abbot: A Decade of Brazen Abbot Live
